original_article.title: Price predictions 8/4: SPX, DXY, BTC, ETH, XRP, BNB, SOL, DOGE, ADA, XLM
original_article.summary: Rakesh Upadhyay 8 minutes ago Price predictions 8/4: SPX, DXY, BTC, ETH, XRP, BNB, SOL, DOGE, ADA, XLM Bitcoin is trying to start a recovery from $112,000, but bears may pose a substantial challenge at $117,000 and then at $120,000. Listen 0:00 153 Price Analysis COINTELEGRAPH IN YOUR SOCIAL FEEDKey points:Bitcoin is trying to take support near $112,000, but higher levels are likely to attract selling by the bears. The deep pullback in several altcoins suggests the next leg of the up move may not happen in a hurry.
